titles.title: Classicaloid (2017)
ClassicaLoid S2
クラシカロイド (2017)
Classicaloid 2
클래시컬로이드 2
克拉斯卡劳埃德 第二季

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch82426 [Kanae], a normal high school girl, is reunited with her least favorite house guests. There`s http://anidb.net/ch84070 [Beet-san] (otherwise known as Ludwig van Beethoven) and free-spirited http://anidb.net/ch84071 [Motz] (Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart), as well as fellow squatters http://anidb.net/ch84069 [Chopin], http://anidb.net/ch84072 [Liszt], and http://anidb.net/ch84068 [Schubert]. These maestros have already proven they have the skill to save the world with their explosive melodies called "Musik," but with the addition of two new Classicaloids - http://anidb.net/ch90178 [Wagner] and http://anidb.net/ch91290 [Dvorak] – Kanae is sure to be at her wits` end. What new realities will these ClassicaLoids compose with their Musik? Source: sentai filmworks

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: ED variety
tag.description: Several ED sequences in this anime have either a different song or different animation, maybe even to the point of having a unique ED for each episode.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: フィーバー! レッツぷーぎー!
Fever! Let`s Pugi
피버! 렛츠 푸기!
Fever! Let`s Pugi!
episode.summary: Dovo the hippo becomes a hit on the internet, and his popularity is bringing visitors to the mansion in droves to pay tribute. Chopin attempts to save his new friend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひと目会ったその日から
Ever Since the Day We First Met
처음 만난 그날부터
Hitome Atta Sono Hi kara
episode.summary: A mixer brings out Motz`s mischievous side, and he drags Sosuke, Chopin, and Kanae`s friends into playing the King`s Game. Love seems like a long shot, but not for one person. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マイリトルブラザー
My Little Brother
마이 리틀 브라더
My Little Brother
episode.summary: Beethoven`s patience for Wataru is wearing thin. A war of chores to win Kanae`s affections gets vicious, but Beet`s latest Musik strikes a strange chord with Wataru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カバと弟と音羽館
Hippo and Little Brother and Otowa Mansion
하마와 남동생과 오토와관
Kaba to Otouto to Otowakan
episode.summary: Life is chaotic as ever in the Otowa Mansion. One similarly frustrating morning, Kanae gets a new visitor: a hippo and a boy who claims to be her little brother. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハハはカニ カバはサイ
Mother Provides the Crab, Hippo Becomes a Rhino
엄마는 게 하마는 코뿔소
Haha wa Kani Kaba wa Sai
episode.summary: While Kanae is out, the household decide to play a few tricks on Wataru. Their plans go a bit sideways though, with the appearance of Kanae’s mother. Why is she visiting? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 偉大なる男
A Great Man
위대한 남자
Idai Naru Otoko
episode.summary: A mysterious man only known as The Great is ending all conflict and spreading world peace with the power of reggae. However, there may be such a thing as TOO much peace... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソつきはモツのはじまり
To Be Motz Is to Fib
거짓말을 모츠 밥 먹듯 한다
Usotsuki wa Motsu no Hajimari
episode.summary: Beethoven turns into a Hippo and Mozart brings over a new friend. What will happen when Mari’s and Motz’s past collide? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 歌苗, お婿さん募集中
Looking for a Husband for Kanae
카나에 남편 모집 중
Kanae, Omuko-san Boshuuchuu
episode.summary: Now that Himeka has decided to stick around will her motherly instincts take over and lead her to be too interested in Kanae’s love life? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワーグナーの野望
Wagner`s Ambition
바그너의 야망
Wagner no Yabou
episode.summary: Wagner and Bach-sama get into a heated argument as Wagner`s deep, thirst for a revolution maybe closer than he thinks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 塩しかねんだよ
Nothing But Saltiness
소금밖에 없어
Shio Shika Nenda yo
episode.summary: Wa-kun is starting to fulfill his ambitions. Will everything go as he hopes, or will there be a kink in his plan? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リストvs.リスト 運命の鐘[ゴング]
Liszt vs Risuto: Bell (Gong) of Destiny
리스트 vs. 리스트 운명의 종소리
Liszt vs. Risuto: Unmei no Gong
episode.summary: Kanae finds a flier about a new piano school, and Liszt isn`t too happy about it. Will Liszt be able to keep her cool? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ○[まる]のない世界
A World Without Circles
원이 없는 세계
Maru no Nai Sekai
episode.summary: The sudden disappearance of objects from around the house has each of the occupants up in arms to find the apparent thief. Who in the world is the culprit? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 年忘れ! 紅白ムジーク合戦
Forget the Year`s Hardships! Red vs. White Musik Contest
송년회! 홍백무지크합전
Toshiwakare! Kouhaku Musik Kassen
episode.summary: The ClassicaLoids are ending the year on a high note, with a Musik Contest! Which team will be victorious? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未知との再会
A Reunion with the Great Unknown
미지와의 재회
Michi to no Saikai
episode.summary: After an explosion in a concert hall, Beethoven starts to act strange causing trouble for the occupants of the mansion. Will they be able to return Beethoven back to normal? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どすこい音羽部屋
Dosukoi! Otowa Sumo Stable
으랏차차 오토와 합숙소
Dosukoi Otowa Heya
episode.summary: Himeka proposes that the guys participate in a Sumo Tournament. Will her true goal for the event be enough to entice them to join, and resolve the issues Wa-kun has caused? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋せよアイドル, 旅せよコビトカバ
Fall in Love, Pop Idol! Travel, Pygmy Hippo!
사랑하라 아이돌, 여행하라 애기하마
Koi Seyo Idol, Tabi Seyo Kobitokaba
episode.summary: Now that Wa-kun has knocked his competition out of the way, his idol status has him alienating Dovo. Meanwhile, Bada is working out what to do with her new found freedom? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 荒野のウエスタンロイド
Westernloids of the Wild West
황야의 웨스턴로이드
Kouya no Westernloid
episode.summary: There’s a new sheriff in town and she doesn’t play any games! Later, a fierce gun tottin’ brawl ensues in the town and the Mansion isn’t big enough for the ClassicaLoids! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さよなら, 姉さん
Goodbye, Big Sister
잘 있어, 누나
Sayonara, Nee-san
episode.summary: Wa-kun is back and his deep thirst for a revolution is stronger than ever before! What happens when that ambition is taken too far? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドボちゃんの憂鬱
The Melancholy of Dovo-chan
드보의 우울
Dovo-chan no Yuuutsu
episode.summary: Dovo the hippo wishes to become human and his wish is within reach when he discovers a special medicine. What happens when that medicine gets into the wrong hands? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シューベルトの憂鬱
The Melancholy of Schubert
슈베르트의 우울
Schubert no Yuuutsu
episode.summary: A simple errand to the grocery store becomes a symphony of musical madness when Schubert and Mozart are in the mix. What could possibly go wrong? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 英雄ショパン
Chopin the Hero
영웅 쇼팽
Eiyuu Chopin
episode.summary: The Otowa Mansion becomes the model for a manga that Chopin wrote and becomes a big hit at Kanae’s school! The mansion residents aren’t too happy about their newfound fame. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 姉と弟
Big Sister and Little Brother
누나와 동생
Ane to Otouto
episode.summary: Wagner’s musik has completely taken over and is confined in a prison of epic proportions. Can the unconditional love from his family and friends save him? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 待ち人来たりて城が建つ
A Long-Awaited Person Arrives, a Castle Is Built
기다리는 이 나타나고 성이 세워진다
Machibito Kitarite Shiro ga Tatsu
episode.summary: What is supposed to be an emotional reunion, turns into turmoil when Wagner unleashes all the musik stolen from the other Classicaloids. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バッハクラクラニーベルング
Bach, Clakla, Nibelungen
바흐 클라클라 니벨룽
Bach Kurakura Nibelung
episode.summary: CLAKLA is back and better than ever when Bach composes a new song for the pop idol group! Meanwhile, Wagner’s thirst for a revolution intensifies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ザ ラスト クラシカロイド
The Last Classicaloid
더 라스트 클래시컬로이드
The Last Classicaloid
episode.summary: Unsure of his post-graduation plans, Sosuke dreams big about what his future will hold. Source: crunchyroll
